meanings.sent1: She procrastinates on starting her homework until late at night.
meanings.sent2: He always procrastinates when it comes to cleaning his room.
meanings.sent3: The cat procrastinates on pouncing on the toy mouse, making the game more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Time procrastinates like a slow turtle when waiting for the weekend.
meanings.sent5: Procrastinates, like a sneaky thief, steals precious moments of productivity.

meanings.sent1: They procrastinate making important decisions until the last minute.
meanings.sent2: I tend to procrastinate paying bills until the due date is near.
meanings.sent3: The tree procrastinates shedding its leaves, holding onto its autumn colors a bit longer.
meanings.sent4: The sun procrastinates setting, painting the sky with vibrant hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: Procrastinates, like a stubborn child, refuses to move forward until pushed.
